original_text: So, because we are God's children, we should not think that he is a thing like an idol. Clever people use gold or silver or stone to make images of gods. But God is not like these things that people choose to make for themselves.
korean_text: 이와 같이 하나님의 소생이 되었은즉 하나님을 금이나 은이나 돌에다 사람의 기술과 고안으로 새긴 것들과 같이 여길 것이 아니니라

sentences.original_text: So, because we are God's children
that he is a thing like an idol
Clever people use gold or silver or stone
sentences.korean_translation: 영리한 사람들은 금이나 은이나 돌을 사용합니다

sentences.original_text: But God is not like these things
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 하나님은 이런 것들과 같지 않습니다

sentences.original_text: that people choose to make for themselves
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들이 스스로를 위해 만들기로 선택한 것들
